ModMetaData.name: [LYN] Nanotech Overpower
ModMetaData.author: Lyn the Cookie
ModMetaData.description: Adds a ton of OP stuff. - Nanobots, a very overpowered building material. Can be used to make anything, from walls to clothes to axes. - Nanoberries, a delicious food made from nanobots. Can be eaten raw! - A Nanofabricator that can make almost all vanilla resources, from Wood to Luciferium to Resurrector Mech Serum. - A Nanogenerator and Nanobattery for your infinite energy purposes. - A Nanosoil that can grow plants almost instantly. - The Nanoblaster, an extremely powerful ranged weapon that can take down a mechanoid army!
